TopicTitle: Stock game crashes when flying SSTOs

Articles.Content:
I thought this was probably because of my dozens of mods, but I just deleted them all, tried it, and the game crashed at the same place as before, just like usual.

I fly my plane up to about 25km, after about 10-15mins, and at that point it crashes with the generic Window's program has crashed dialogue.

Doesn't leave any logs unfortunately. 

Has anyone else experienced these problems?
KSP should create a log in your install directory as it's running, and though it can be cut short in a crash, there's always some information there.
What's the path to this log from the game root?
The KSP.log should be next to the KSP.exe, output\_log.txt is in KSPData.
